Uses of Package
org.taverna.server.master.utils

  • Packages that use org.taverna.server.master.utils 
    Package Description
    org.taverna.server.master
    The core of the implementation of Taverna Server, including the implementations of the SOAP and REST interfaces.
    org.taverna.server.master.admin
    This package contains the RESTful administration interface to Taverna Server.
    org.taverna.server.master.api
    API interfaces for the main service classes.
    org.taverna.server.master.facade
    Simple facade used at the top level of the Taverna Server in order to provide an entry splash page.
    org.taverna.server.master.factories
    These interfaces define the principal way for the factories of worker classes to be invoked.
    org.taverna.server.master.identity
    Implementations of beans that map global user identities to local usernames.
    org.taverna.server.master.interaction
    This package contains the Atom feed implementation for interactions for a particular workflow run.
    org.taverna.server.master.interfaces
    Interfaces to the main worker classes that provide the magical power that drives the webapp front-end.
    org.taverna.server.master.localworker
    Implementation of a Taverna Server back-end that works by forking off workflow executors on the local system.
    org.taverna.server.master.notification.atom
    This package contains the Atom feed implementation within Taverna Server.
    org.taverna.server.master.usage
    Resource usage recording mechanism.
    org.taverna.server.master.utils
    Miscellaneous utility classes.
    org.taverna.server.master.worker
    A Taverna Server back-end that works by forking off workflow executors.
  • Classes in org.taverna.server.master.utils used by org.taverna.server.master 
    Class and Description
    CallTimeLogger.PerfLogged
    Mark methods that should be counted by the invocation counter.
    CapabilityLister
    Utility for listing the capabilities supported by this Taverna Server installation.
    FilenameUtils
    Utility functions for getting entries from directories.
    InvocationCounter
    This class is responsible for counting all invocations of publicly-exposed methods of the webapp.
    InvocationCounter.CallCounted
    Mark methods that should be counted by the invocation counter.
    UsernamePrincipal
    A simple serializable principal that just records the name.
  • Classes in org.taverna.server.master.utils used by org.taverna.server.master.admin 
    Class and Description
    InvocationCounter
    This class is responsible for counting all invocations of publicly-exposed methods of the webapp.

  • Classes in org.taverna.server.master.utils used by org.taverna.server.master.facade 
    Class and Description
    Contextualizer
    Convert a string (URL, etc) to a version that is contextualized to the web-application.
  • Classes in org.taverna.server.master.utils used by org.taverna.server.master.factories

    Simple support class that wraps up and provides access to the correct parts of JDO.

    Mark a method (of a subclass of JDOSupport) as having a transaction wrapped around it.

  • Classes in org.taverna.server.master.utils used by org.taverna.server.master.worker 
    Class and Description

    Mark methods that should be counted by the invocation counter.

    Obtains the certificate chain for an arbitrary SSL service.
    FilenameUtils
    Utility functions for getting entries from directories.

    Mark a method (of a subclass of JDOSupport) as having a transaction wrapped around it.
    UsernamePrincipal
    A simple serializable principal that just records the name.
    X500Utils
    Support class that factors out some of the messier parts of working with X.500 identities and X.509 certificates.
